ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T17:26:20 [Issue ID 4000-414151] urn:comicvine:4000-414151 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 05:04:44. [Issue ID 65865]
ComicInfo.Summary: The first of the TALES Of TELLOS recounts the story of Pirate Queen, SERRA, and her first journey as a young girl aboard the Sheva Nova. Featuring the American debut of French artistic sensation, CRISSE!! Reknowned for his work on such titles as Kookaburra and Atalante, CRISSE lends his lively and whimsical style to this Tale of adventure on the High Seas! TALES Of TELLOS is a bi-monthly comic featuring solo stories both past and present of TELLOS colorful cast--with clues and events which lead directly into the next story arc by creators Mike Wieringo and Todd Dezago, TELLOS: SECOND COMING!
ComicInfo.Title: Maiden Voyage; Clothes Call
